page.title: 07ARABLE FARMING: BOWERCHALKE
page.content: Crops are grown on ll8l acres, mostly as part of a 3 year rota: cereals, gras and kale etc. CEREALS Wheat, mainly winter sown Types - Avalon, Rapier, Armada, Norman Guardian. Barley, winter & spring sown Types - Patty, Klaxon, Etem, Triumph, GR 1. Oats - minor crop. Cereal yield - 55- 60 cwt per acre: this yield requires high fertilising & pesticide treatment. MINOR CROPS Grass seed - 7 cwt per acre Tic beans - 25 cwt per acre Turnips & kale for animal feeding Where there is evidence of Ancient Settlements, Ditches & Tumuli, the Historic Buildings Commission recompense farmers for not ploughing..
